availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Amaziah Bradord (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, steamboat engineer.)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, steamboat engineer. Ohio native. Son of William Bradford and Mary Ann Bradford. Married to Ellen Bradford. Father of Anna Bradford. Resident of Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1850. Steamboat engineer in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 2, p. 233B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 2, p. 576.
